v1.headline: LinkedIn GTM strategy for B2B business using AI, social selling & relevant content. | 30+ clients transformed | Co-Founder of Nomad V Group
v1.about:
You have two paths as a founder, coach or consultant on LinkedIn:

➤ Path 1: 

Keep trading time for money... 
Working harder but earning the same... 
Your expertise stays hidden... 

You will: 

→ Stay stuck in the 9-5 grind 
→ Watch others with less skill charge more. 
→ Feel frustrated knowing you're worth more 
→ Miss out on the freedom you deserve
→ Have unpredictable revenue


➤ Path 2: Turn your skills into a 5-fig/mo system and save 20+ hours per week.

I've helped 30+ founders & solopreneurs from different industries take Path 2 using AI-powered LinkedIn strategies.

Here's how it works:

✅ Offer Creation & Validation - Package your skills into irresistible offers that command premium prices

✅ Social Selling Mastery - Build qualified lead lists and book 2-5 meetings per week through strategic outreach, personalized lead magnets and commenting campaigns

✅ AI Personal Brand Accelerator - Unlock your unique business genius and position yourself as the go-to expert. 

✅ Conversion Content System - Create content repurposing system that converts prospects into paying clients with 1 post & 1 email daily

✅ Performance Optimization - Track, measure, and scale your LinkedIn

➤ What makes this different?

I quit my 9-5 job in 8 months after being active on LinkedIn
In my second year on LinkedIn, I hit my first 3 consistent months with 10K+.

I was there.
I know what it is like to be in the situation where you currently are.
I made so many mistakes until I got where I am currently.

That’s why you can skip what I get wrong and make it work way more faster.

This isn't about becoming an influencer or posting motivational quotes.

It's about using your existing skills + simple AI tools and workflows + LinkedIn to create predictable income.

Real results from real people you can see in my recommendation section.

The truth? 
You already have everything you need. 
You just need the right system to package and sell it.

---

➤ DM me and I'll show you exactly how this works.
